thread.section_title: Dharma Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Design over practicality
thread.title_full: Design over practicality - Review of Dharma Hotel, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Elena B
title: Design over practicality
text: Good location, very clean rooms and nice Italian design, but we found the room to be too small and not practical. The bathroom area was aesthetically appealing but difficult to use because of its design (toilets and sink were located behind a massive and heavy door that needed to be handled carefully). I guess the hotel has bigger and more comfortable rooms, but ours was definitely to small for 2 people.
